channel.title: [508] Drop Glitch
channel.description: Hey, I have what I think is a glitch in my [508]. When I was playing it with my friend as a test to see if it runs OK, I was killing monsters but he was getting the drops. Even when I was in the Slayer Tower and he was in the GE. What is up with it? Reply please, because I never get any help on here...

item.title: [508] Drop Glitch
